title: DS 362: Data-Driven Knowledge Discovery
text:
Welcome to the course website for DS 362: Data-Driven Knowledge Discovery for Fall 2023.
This course is offered at the University of Scranton and is being taught by Jason M. Graham (Mathematics Department) during the Fall 2023 semester.

title: DS 362: Data-Driven Knowledge Discovery

title: Syllabus
text:
Required Readings

An Introduction to Statistical Learning 2nd Ed. by James, Witten, Hastie, and Tibshirani, freely available online here.
Elements of Statistical Learning 2nd Ed. by Hastie, Tibshirani, and Friedman, freely available online here.
Statistical Learning with Math and R by Joe Suzuki, available online through the Weinberg Library here.

title: Syllabus
text:
R References

Hands-On Programming with R by Garrett Grolemund, freely available online here.
R for Data Science by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund, freely available online here.

title: Syllabus
text:
Additional Readings

Statistical Learning from a Regression Perspective by Richard A. Berk, available online through the Weinberg Library here.
